    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cauterizing Torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1105)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Gadget" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=405" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 67</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society)  Inventors (and characters with the Inventor archetype) gain access to uncommon gadgets from Chapters 1 and 2 from this book, unless the item specifically states otherwise._

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access**  Due to the use of technology, all gadgets are uncommon or rare, though inventors and regions with access to inventors have access to uncommon gadgets.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small, clockwork torch device uses a trigger-operated sparker to ignite a flow of flammable gas, creating a short, hot flame capable of rapidly cauterizing wounds and helping to stop bleeding. The cauterizing torch is applied to yourself or an adjacent target. The target attempts an immediate flat check to end any [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) effect with the lower DC for particularly effective assistance.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
